title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Floral Necklace
materials: pear-shaped Emeralds (Eme: 8.19ct) of exceptional clarity and brilliance
complemented by sparkling round brilliant-cut diamonds (D.pan(+7): 3.12ct
features: This necklace showcases a delicate floral design, meticulously crafted with prong and pave settings to maximize the brilliance of the diamonds and emeralds. The central emeralds are adorned with pear shape emerald drops, creating a focal point of elegance and sophistication. Modern design with timeless appeal, perfect for the contemporary woman.
colors: Lustrous white gold creates a stunning contrast with the intense green of the emeralds and the fiery white of the diamonds. Classic color combination for high jewelry.
occasions: or any special event where you want to make a lasting impression. Its modern design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and black-tie affairs.
description: A true statement piece, this necklace effortlessly blends contemporary design with classic elegance. The vibrant emeralds, carefully selected for their exceptional color and clarity, symbolize prosperity and new beginnings. The intricate diamond work enhances the overall brilliance, making this a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its versatile design ensures it can be worn with both traditional and modern attire.
